sys_script_fix.name: Fillable PDF

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_fix_1994cdcf1bc73050eef0cb72604bcbcf
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>Fillable PDF</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[var pdf = new global.GeneralPdfUtils();

// Sys ID of an attachment

var attachmentSysId = 'adc685c31b0b3050eef0cb72604bcbe9';

var jsonObject = {
    "name": "Yes"
  };

var jsonString = JSON.stringify(jsonObject);
var destinationTableName = 'x_sohd3_spo_036_spo_036table';
var destinationTableSysId = '40e1651d1b7e74107fd2cbfa234bcb60';

var pdfName = 'my-completed-form.pdf';

pdf.prefillPdf(jsonString, destinationTableSysId, attachmentSysId, destinationTableName, pdfName);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>karim_admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-11 15:31:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>1994cdcf1bc73050eef0cb72604bcbcf</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Fillable PDF</sys_name><sys_package display_value="DOTMail" source="x_sohd3_dotmail">f953a5641b79b8107fd2cbfa234bcb32</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="DOTMail">f953a5641b79b8107fd2cbfa234bcb32</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_1994cdcf1bc73050eef0cb72604bcbcf</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>karim_admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-11 15:32:37</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
